mean_cn: n. 致意；问候；  vi. 致意；  vt. 向…致意；向…行举手礼；称赞
mean_en: to give a sign of respect to (a military officer, flag, etc.) by moving your right hand to your forehead :to give a salute to (someone or something)
sentence: Mr. Kim salutes to the crowd in a non-standard way.
sentence_trans: 金同志给群众敬礼的姿势一点也不标准。
